text: Kathleen Byron (11 January 1921 â€“ 18 January 2009) was a British actress. She acted in movies, theatre, and on television. She played Sister Ruth in Black Narcissus She played Annette in The Reluctant Widow (1950). Byron was born in London. She died there at age 88.
